divs: Sighting Details I was sealing a leak in my cabin siding at 1030 pm, starry night, no clouds in sky, back was turned to the sky, I wassquatting and i noticed a bright light behind me, i kinda turned and said thanksfor the light,I then realized my girlfriend was in the cabin and no one wasthere, a very isolated area.As I turned I saw 3 bright orange yellow glowingspheres moving to the north, no sound. The light appeared to shine in front ofme on the siding that i was working on but I dont recall a shadow from thelight, the light just illuminated the area i was working on.I called out to mygirlfriend and she came out and i told her what happened, as we were talkingabout it, we heard what appeared to be thunder but as it went on for 30-45secondss we realized it sounded more like muffled explosions.The explosionsounds happened about 3 minutes after i saw the glowing spheres.
